name: Time Dilation Calculator
description: Calculate relativistic time dilation effects for objects moving at significant fractions of light speed using Einstein's special relativity equations. Input spaceship time and velocity to compute time dilation relative to Earth observers.
keywords: time dilation, special relativity, Einstein calculator, physics tool, relativistic effects

howTo.name: How to Calculate Relativistic Time Dilation

step.text: Enter the elapsed time experienced on the spaceship (in seconds)
step.name: Enter spaceship time

step.text: Enter the spaceship's velocity relative to Earth (in km/second)
step.name: Enter velocity

step.text: Click Calculate to determine the time experienced by Earth observers
step.name: Calculate

step.text: View results showing time dilation effects relative to light speed (299,792.458 km/s)
step.name: View results

supply.name: Velocity input
supply.itemListElement: Must be less than speed of light (299,792.458 km/s)

about.name: Time Dilation
about.description: The relativistic phenomenon where time measured in different inertial frames will differ when objects move at significant fractions of light speed
